subscriptionDetails.title: Subscription Details
subscriptionDetails.description: Extension of the subscription data type to include subscription length, fees, status, etc.

earlyUpgradeEnrollment.title: Early Upgrade Enrollment
earlyUpgradeEnrollment.description: Captures if the customer opts into early upgrades.

planLevel.title: Plan Level
planLevel.description: Captures the name of the mobile plan assigned to this device.

phoneNumber.title: Phone Number
phoneNumber.description: Captures the phone number assigned to this device.

portedNumber.title: Ported Number
portedNumber.description: Captures if the customer ports their number from another carrier.
